TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier

remarks.format:
## Remarks Instances of this type identify specific control patterns. For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Pattern?displayProperty=fullName> field identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern> control pattern.
## Examples The following example displays the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier.ProgrammaticName%2A> of patterns supported by an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
The following example shows how to request a specific pattern.
[!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern LookupById(int32 id) cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves an that encapsulates a specified numerical identifier.
